topic.title: Exercise: graf005 - Relationship production time - cost

section.p: A toy manufacturing company suspects that the price of the toys largely depends on the production time. To investigate this, the production time of the toys is measured. The results and the associated cost are listed in the following figure.

ol.li: Create a chart in which the cost is plotted against the production time (the independent variable).
Add a linear trend line to the chart. Also, add the equation of the trend line to the chart.

section.title: Solution
section.p:

Layout adjustments: scaling axis, legend, horizontal gridlines.
Add a linear trendline in the chart and display the equation.
